articles.author: Emmet Lyons
articles.title: Australia plans "world-leading" social media ban for children under 16 - CBS News
articles.description: "Social media is doing harm to our kids and I'm calling time on it," says Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanse.
articles.content: Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese announced Thursday what he called a "world-leading" plan to implement a social media ban for all children under the age of 16. While much of the detail of t… [+3162 chars]
